alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 10:06AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Any leftover snow will continue to transition to rain. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Interior Rockingham County. In Maine, Coastal Cumberland and Coastal York Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Clogged storm drains may lead to ponding of water on roadways once precipitation changes to rain. Cold and windy conditions return Monday night and Tuesday with low wind chill values developing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
